description: Police investigate after two boys aged between 13 and 14 attempted to rob another teenager in the street in Arbroath.
title: Police seek teens over attempted robbery in Arbroath
title_page: Police seek teens over attempted robbery in Arbroath - BBC News
maintext:
Police are looking for two boys aged between 13 and 14 who attempted to rob a teenager in Arbroath.
The 16-year-old male was targeted by the two younger boys, who threatened him and attempted to rob him of cash on West John Street.
The incident took place between 21:00 and 22:00 on Sunday.
Officers have appealed for witnesses, in particular the driver of a van bearing the name "Vertex" which drove past during the incident.
